overview: Back from hell after more than 60 years, Wasted Pido, an in-famous country guitarist of 40', became a one man band. The film follows him and his fellow one man bands - Sheriff Perkins, Bruno Guordo, Beat Tease Tavern, Number 71, on the road between London, Naples and Venice, dealing with crazy live performances, bad payed jobs, unconventional instruments, tons of cigars coffee, beer, whiskey, a crashed car and the never-ending highway.
title: Cowpunx from Hell
